[by:小陀螺Tony]
[00:29.82]Platinum
[00:37.21]Platinum
[00:44.85]Platinum
[00:46.27]A bitter sweet symphony
[00:49.76]With minor key melodies
[00:52.54]They’re soundtracks to our lives
[00:56.12]But we know we’ll survives
[01:01.42]Silence we’ll come again
[01:05.16]Right when the music ends
[01:07.64]We’ll change the key tonight
[01:11.68]Standing side by side
[01:15.18]
[01:16.09]This war has a way of making us who we are
[01:23.47]Can't burn in the flames
[01:25.79]We're fighting with platinum hearts
